itunes:title: This Is the Gospel Week 1 with Jessica Lamb
title: This Is the Gospel Week 1 with Jessica Lamb
description:
Join Raechel and Amanda for the first half of This Is the Gospel, along with She Reads Truth’s editorial director, Jessica Lamb. Where does the gospel narrative begin, who does it begin with, and how do creation and the fall play a role in it? Listen in to this week’s episode as Raechel, Amanda, and Jessica respond to the invitational nature of the gospel by answering these questions and more. 


Read with Us: 

This episode corresponds to Week 1 of the She Reads Truth This Is the Gospel reading plan found on the She Reads Truth app and SheReadsTruth.com. 

Shop the This Is the Gospel collection at ShopSheReadsTruth.com. 

Show notes can be found at shereadstruth.com/podcast/this-is-the-gospel-week-1-with-jessica-lamb
